means: 胆小鬼，女人气的男人，胆小无用的男子
[女子名] 西西 Cecil,Cecilia,Cecily,Cicely,Sisley等的昵称

sentence.Network_en: "Last one in the sea is a sissy," proclaimed Idris.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊德里斯大声地宣告说：“在海里，谁落在最后谁就不是爷儿们。”

sentence.Network_en: Nina looks the spitting image of Sissy Spacek.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼娜看起来像极了茜茜·斯帕赛克。

sentence.Network_en: Far from being sissy, it takes a real man to accept that he is not perfect.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有真正的男人才会接受自己并非完美无缺的事实，这绝不是什么女孩子气。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生活英语单词大全 - 豆丁网 ... 足球流氓 hooligan 娘娘腔 sissy 瘟生 sucker.
48个国际音标表 ... 3. reassuring adj. 安心的, 可靠的 4. sissy n. 胆小鬼 2. durable adj. 持久的, 耐用的.
英语常用俚语 - 玉帝的日志 - 网易博客 ... silly as a goose 蠢蛋 sissy 娘娘腔的，基佬 sit on the top of the world 自大.
腐女必备英文词汇扫盲 _普特英语听力 ... 女同性恋： lesbian 娘娘腔男人（伪娘）： sissy 同性恋： homosexual.

list.abs: now these kids diss me and act like some big sissies .现在这些孩子批评我的行为就像一些大龄娘娘腔。
＂相亲＂英文怎么说?_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... satyr( 色魔) sissy man( 屁精) eunuch( 阉人,太监).
I hate to talk to Charles . he is too sissy .我不喜欢与查理谈话，他太娘娘腔了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (in the sense 'sister'): from sis + -y

entry.tran: 女孩子气的男孩;胆小怯懦的男孩
entry.def: Some people, especially men, describe a boy as a sissy when they disapprove of him because he does not like rough, physical activities or is afraid to do things which might be dangerous.

example.ex: They were rough kids, and thought we were sissies...
example.tran: 他们那帮孩子野蛮得很，还认为我们太女孩子气。

example.ex: 'Last one in the sea is a sissy,' proclaimed Idris.
example.tran: 伊德里斯大声地宣告说：“在海里，谁落在最后谁就不是爷儿们。”

entry.def: If you describe an action or activity as sissy, you disapprove of it because you think it is only appropriate for girls or women.

example.ex: Far from being sissy, it takes a real man to accept that he is not perfect.
example.tran: 只有真正的男人才会接受自己并非完美无缺的事实，这绝不是什么女孩子气。

example.ex: ...men who feel that writing is essentially a sissy occupation.
example.tran: 把写作看成基本上是娘儿们家所为的男人

means.word_mean: 1. a timid man or boy considered childish or unassertive
